## Quarto

```{r}
data(Indometh)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Indometh, aes(x = time, y = conc, group = Subject, color = factor(Subject))) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()
```

#Analysis：This graph illustrates the plasma concentration changes in 6 subjects over 0.25–8 hours post-administration, showing an overall trend of rapid decline followed by gradual stabilization. Curves of different colors represent individual subjects, revealing similar decay patterns with some inter-subject variability.
